author: dkulp
msg: Turn on the uniqueversion things as Maven3 doesn't support it anymore and it's confusing Nexus' maven-metadata calculation

author: dkulp
msg: Fix pmd setup in eclipse for SDO

author: mgrigorov
msg: Add a comment to HomePageMapper that it doesn't handle generation of Url for IRequestHandler's
If the user application wants to preserve '/' as url then it must mount it explicitly in MyApplication#init()
Idea: we could do that automatically in #internalInit() and remove completely HomePageMapper.
Remove the check in AbstractMapper because otherwise it is not possible to mount at '/'
